title: Failed To Connect
body:
I have been having an issue where i would proceed from champion select, into the loading screen where it would not load anything (a black screen). After a while a message shows up saying Failed to Connect.

Screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/D05efkw.png

I have tried reinstalling and repairing my client, but it doesn't work and i don't know what to do now.

replies.body:
Currently, there is an issue with LoLReplay that is causing League of Legends not to launch properly.  This isn't the normal error message associated with it, but make sure to completely uninstall it in case you use it.

Otherwise, if you don't use LoLReplay at all, this error usually pops up when your computer isn't able to establish a connection to the individual game server.  In order to get this resolved, make sure to complete all of the steps found in our [Connection Issues Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664).  The steps there are the most common solutions that should let you connect normally and get rid of this error.

Reply back and let me know if you are still experiencing this issue!

So i tried things on that connection issue guide, and didn't seem to work... I don't know what to do. I also tried http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=2721892&page=7
that guide but also had to success. Seems like i can't play league for a while.

If none of those steps seem to be helping you out, make sure to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!  One of our Tech Specialists will work with you one-on-one in order to get this issue resolved.  If you do submit a ticket, make sure to include the following as well!

1) [Network Analysis](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq1)

2) [Network Information Log](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq4)

3) [Process List](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq3)
when people get in to game i can load in but when they aren't in game yet i can't load in
yay finaly a rioter, pls tell me how to add a thumbnail into my boards discussion ): ive been looking and asking for an hour now

luckly i decided to try some custom games first to see the new idle fiddlesticks change, but i just couldnt connect to game so i havent been hit with an afk report, but i really hope this gets fixed soon so i can actually play the game.
SAME, wont connect to my game, now i will just get reported for afk ._.

Same exact issue here. Kinda ridiculous if you ask me. Seems like Riot is trying hard to convince people to play other games or something. I have never seen the client as bad as it is the past month or two.
